data.name: AdIndustryBullet_01
data.value: Users are barraged with annoying and irrelevant ads.

data.name: AdIndustryBullet_02
data.value: User data has become commoditized and is bought and sold with little regard for privacy, relevance or effectiveness.

data.name: AdIndustryBullet_03
data.value: Publishers find it difficult to make money from their traffic. They monetize their subscribers indirectly rather than directly.

data.name: AdIndustryBullet_04
data.value: Most advertisers are forced to rely on banner & display ads rather than tapping into the effectiveness of publisher subscriber bases.

data.name: AdIndustryBullet_05
data.value: App partners can't scale without building a marketplace first. Widespread user adoption is extremely difficult to attain.

data.name: AdIndustryHeading
data.value: Current Digital Ad Industry

data.name: HeroTextEnd_01
data.value: Advertisers save money. Publishers keep more of what they earn.

data.name: HeroTextEnd_02
data.value: Users aren't barraged with annoying and irrelevant ads.

data.name: HeroTextStart_01
data.value: Kind Ads is an advertising platform that serves user-friendly ads

data.name: IntegrationsText
data.value: Focus on your campaigns, let us take care of your integrations with top publishers.

data.name: KindAdsBullet_01
data.value: Kind Ads will show you more relevant ads through channels like email marketing and push notifications.

data.name: KindAdsBullet_02
data.value: Users will be able to specify exactly how their data will be used, and be incentivized more to allow access via a tokenized rewards pool.

data.name: KindAdsBullet_03
data.value: We're allowing publishers to easily sell access to their subscribers directly to advertisers.

data.name: KindAdsBullet_04
data.value: Advertisers will be able to find the publishers based on subscriber quality and run campaigns with confidence.

data.name: KindAdsBullet_05
data.value: The tokenized rewards pool is allocated daily to publishers, users AND app partners.
